Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 01.11.2023

As the owner of https://vongerichten.com and https://matthias.vongerichten.co, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy notice provides information about the personal data we collect and how it is used and protected.

Data Controller:

  • Name: Matthias Vongerichten
  • Contact Information: matthias@vongerichten.com

Purpose of Data Processing: We collect IP addresses solely for the purpose of maintaining the security and performance of our website. This data is logged automatically by our web server.

Legal Basis for Processing: The legal basis for processing your IP address is our legitimate interest in protecting our website and ensuring its stability and security, and is technically necessary to provide the web page to you.

Recipients of Data: The IP addresses are stored in server logs managed by our web hosting provider, super.so. These logs are accessible only to our hosting provider.

Data Retention: We retain server logs containing IP addresses until you ask us to delete this information.

Your Rights: Under the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, and restrict the processing of your personal data. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided above.

Right to Lodge a Complaint: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe your data protection rights have been breached.

Changes to This Notice: We may update this privacy notice from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website with an updated effective date.

For further information or if you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us using the details provided above.
